original_title: The Good, the Rad and the Gnarly
overview: Comedy about Harry Ackerman's nightmares about fun seekers and their skiing adventures. Rodney Mullen and Robby Naish are also included.
tagline: Skateboard with the Converse skate team featuring Rodney Mullen, windsurf with Robby Naish and ski with the world's greatest ski bums - the Gnarly Crew
title: The Good, the Rad and the Gnarly
